name: 林志哲
objective: 培養理論與實務兼備之自動化工程專業人才，除課堂講授與強化實驗實習課程外，更提供應用微處理器之自動控制實務與實習:包含電子儀器之使用說明、Labview VI、isPLC、NI SbRIO之應用。使同學在自動化系統設計與機電整合等領域，加強實務能力。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Signal and system
Week 3. Signal analysis(1)
Week 4. Programable Logical Control
Week 5. PLC experiments (1) 
Week 6. PLC experiments (2)
Week 7. LABView Programming (1)
Week 8. LABView Programming (2)
Week 9. 期中考
Week 10 Labview Programming (3)
Week 11. Labview Programming (4)
Week 12. Control Simulation
Week12 state machine (1)
Week13 state machine (2)
Week 14. LABView 實驗(1)
Week 15.  LABView 實驗(2)
Week 16  LABView 實驗(3)
Week 17. 分組專題製作
Week 18. 期末報告
